widget_admins_new.text: Send a Telegram ID of the new admin. Please remember this person will be a super admin and will have same privileges as you do, they will be able to even revoke your status. Grant this status only to people you trust.
widget_admins_new.validation_error: Please enter a valid Telegram ID

widget_admins_delete.text: Are you sure you want to revoke rights of this admin?
